GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.34 to before v5.15.58
GSD.description:
tcp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_thin_linear_timeouts.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.58 by commit 404c53ccdebd11f96954f4070cffac8e0b4d5cb6, it was introduced in version v2.6.34 by commit 36e31b0af58728071e8023cf8e20c5166b700717. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tcp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_thin_linear_timeouts.
